tool_description: Apple News API provides access to articles and content from leading news sources and magazines. The API offers a rich selection of high-quality, curated articles from top most trusted sources.
title: Apple_News_api

api_list.name: Get all News updates about Apple
api_list.description: With Apple News API, users can easily keep up with the latest news and events, without having to constantly switch between different news websites and apps.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://apple_news_api.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "apple_news_api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
